name: kubernetes-infrastructure
description: Deployment of Kubernetes cluster on Azure
author: Yurii Voutuk <voutuk@icloud.com>

scripts.helm:deploy: kubectl config use-context gosell-aks && bash apply.sh && helm install olx-app ./helm --namespace olx-app
scripts.helm:upd: kubectl config use-context gosell-aks && bash upd.sh && helm upgrade --install olx-app ./helm --namespace olx-app
scripts.onix:deploy: kubectl config use-context onix-aks && bash apply-onix.sh && helm install onix-app ./onix --namespace onix-app
scripts.onix:upd: kubectl config use-context onix-aks && bash upd-onix.sh && helm upgrade --install onix-app ./onix --namespace onix-app
